body.p: The CDA for Tuberculosis Follow Up Progress Note constrains CDA to express the data elements identified by the CRSWg as specific to a follow-up report of tuberculosis. Tuberculosis (TB) is a contagious and potentially life-threatening infectious disease caused by a bacterium called Mycobacterium tuberculosis. The tuberculosis bacteria are spread from person to person through the air.
